name: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 4
description:
Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 4 is a sports-arcade game developed by Beenox, Vicarious Visions and Neversoft. It was originally released in 2002. It was published by Activision Blizzard. Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 4 has a Metascore of 91, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 4 is available on Game Boy Advance, PlayStation, Classic Macintosh and PC.
